name: Cleo Henderson
text: The crust was perfect! Thin and airy yet crispy. I enjoy how fresh the veggies were. Only reason I have it 4 stars is because I wasn't too crazy about salad dressing and shredded mozzarella. I'm more of a fresh mozz guy. Overall, good experience and clean welcoming setting.

name: Brittany Martinez
text: It was a neat place to get your own pizza, nice staff, clean facility, and the food and drinks were great. Definitely looking forward to the next visit.

name: Ms. Jackson
text: I freaking love mod pizza!!! If you want a place were you can get pizza cooked in fire the way it is suppose to be and as many toppings as you want without an upcharge then this place is for you!! They charge varies on the sizes of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Derrick Sherrill
text: Staff took care of us - it was very obviously our first time and they were quick to realize by the blank looks on our faces! Informative and gave recommendations on how to build the best pizza. Did the mini and it was more than enough. The food was cooked perfectly and made to order. Great experience overall.

name: Bob Treue
text: This place has potential. You design your own pizza and toppings (like Subway, except pizza), which was quite good.  However, I also ordered garlic strips, which were absolutely awful. It was like some accidentally spilled the salt shaker ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Dietrich
text: Load up your pizza, there's no hidden up charges. My buffalo-ranch chicken pizza was awesome!

name: Sierra Judice
text: Pizza was delicious. You won't be disappointed. And you can choose as many toppings as you want without an extra charge. Good price too. If you love pizza you will love this place. Enjoy.

name: Robert Malloy
text: Great concept, food, and they offer military incentives!

name: Wesley Gwynne
text: Cheap. Great. Variety. Gluten free and vegan options are satisfying and plentiful! I don't know why ANYONE would walk past without picking up a pizza.

name: Jonathan Lamb
text: Absolutely LOVE this place. They make a personal sized pizza with as many toppings as you want for about $9 with tax. That's an amazing deal. Lots of great toppings to choose from including several veggies you don't see at other pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: donny bliss
text:
Wow. We loved this pizza. Our vegan daughter was overjoyed by the vegan cheese option and the rest of us loved each topping. The roasted garlic cloves were a nice treat.
Staff was superb as well.

name: Tom Blowe
text: This is a excellent place to get a brick oven pizza made any way you want it! The staff was friendly, and it is very clean. The price is very good for what you get, and everything tastes great. If you are looking for a great pizza, look no further.

name: Stewart Andringa
text: Nice place, custom pizzas, with some good vegan options. They are very centraly located in downtown Charleston. Nice to sit down here after a long sight-seeing session.

name: Leslie Page
text: If you have never been to mod pizza, then you have never had this kind of unique pizza experience. Think Moe's, but pizza. They have about every ingredient you can imagine, with any and all ingredients free to add. I started my experience ‚Ä¶More

name: brian wilson
text: The pizza is amazing and the crew here in downtown Charleston is even better! I eat here often and always have a good experience. Not to mention you can create you own pizza with all the toppings you want with no added charge.

name: The Khajiit Bard
text: The place was "alright" at best. The guy who took our order was pretty rude and mumbled to the point he was inaudible. The pizzas were okay, nothing special, but they were also burnt.  The price was a little high for the quality and experience of the place. There are better restaurants in the city.

name: David Coleman
text: I enjoyed the pizza. My daughter needs gluten free crust and the delivered. This is a place I would recommend to those that like pizza.

name: Titus Haney
text: ‚ÄúManagement‚Äù is an absolute joke. Owners should be ashamed with how their customer base is treated

name: David Hobby
text: Ate here a couple of times while visiting Charleston. This (newish) chain of build-your-own, brick oven pizza is really growing on my. Good location here, too, as it is an easy walk from just about anywhere on King Street which is the spine of old Charleston.

name: Negar Ghassemieh
text: Probably my no.1 place to go for a quick delicious pizza.... they are fast and food is amazing.... different sizes of pizza is my favorite part

name: Samantha J.
text: Excellent pizza and beverages!! Go, you won't be disappointed!! Also, the two guys up front were very accommodating and pleasant!

name: Joel Campbell
text: Mod is pretty good and fast. It's nice that you can get any toppings for the same price.

name: jenni Lauria
text: Super friendly and helpful staff and aMAZing food!! Will definitely stop in next time we're in Charleston!

name: Ricki Dykes
text:
BSA Troop 516 from ELIZABETHTON, TN
THANKS MOD, HANDLED OUR GROUP OF 30 .  BEST GF  I HAVE EVER HAD.
ALSO , OTHERS ENJOYED IT AS WELL. KUDOS TO STAFF AND THE PIZZA

name: Dennis Layman
text: Everything about it was great.  Amazing pizza.  Staff was so good too

name: Eleanor Smalls
text: Best pizza ever. Great service. Lovee it

name: Tiratha Patel
text: Its clean and they have the BEST LEMONADE! and their pizza is bomb

name: Anne Palmer
text: Just had lunch at MOD Pizza on Calhoun...it was fast and fantastic!  Great thin crust with anything you want on it...all for the same price!  What a deal.

name: Johanna Kidwell - Sybase
text: Fast, inexpensive, and lots of choices for your pizza. The crust is nice and thin.

name: Joseph Mulcahy
text: Always get good service and there pizza is out of this world.

name: Anthony Welch
text: Best in town order the pizza the way you want flat rate toppings are unlimited.

name: Cheryl Stallworth
text: Love this place! One price and a variety of toppings to make your pizza the way you want!

name: James Fraser
text: SUPER Fresh made to order with fast & friendly service!

name: william cary
text: Love it. 11 inch pizza with any amount of topping for $8.00. Made fresh in front of you and wood fired.

name: Logan Agnew
text: Very good food! Love being able to choose what you want on it.

name: Gabriella Krauss
text: If I could rate negative stars I would. Not sure if it was that days staff but I waited for 20 minuets while they tried to get someone else‚Äôs order together and struggled greatly with it. Will not be coming back.

name: Juanita Simmons
text: It is absolutely amazing best pizza spot in Charleston!!

name: Troy Mass
text: Excellent thin crust pizza cooked in a brick oven

name: Heather Smith
text: Great things crust pizza with tons of topping choice!  Love the pay one price concept.

name: Douglas Rogers
text: Essentially a Chipotle for pizza. Ingredients always look fresh and not unreasonably priced. Service is quick for a made to order pizza and always friendly.

name: Joe Wright
text: A great new pizza place. Like a Moe's only with pizza. Can get over 30 toppings on your pizza, and cheap too.

name: A
text: Good food. Love the make it your way concept.

name: Jeremy Wright
text: Friendly staff, good food, good location, clean facilities

name: Graham Smith
text: Mod has great pizza with tons of options.  Staff is very friendly and gives good recommendations.

name: Heather Thornton
text: Lots of food for the price and can load on anything you want. Sometimes undermanned where there's a line.

name: Travis the Grimm
text: Great food! Loved the choice to modify my pizza with unlimited toppings!

name: Joshua McAda
text: Just okay. I think your pie is better

name: Bill Haber
text: good space, great pizza and convenient location, if you want a quick bite downtown here is the spot

name: Yolanda Pelzer
text: Love the üçï going there today and have lunch

name: Krystle Stephens
text: Very good pizza for a very good price. I would give another star if there were parking.

name: Kristiana Carter
text: Food is okay. Staff is decent.

name: Brad Duke
text: The pizza and salad were really really good

name: Lydia Renn
text: Let down yet again, we came once and our pizzas literally were set on fire, they had to remake them ( they were remade wrong ) so they gave  us a free pizza coupon... went back again tonight for a second chance AGAIN wrong order and under cooked.

name: Edward Keefe
text: Fresh ingredients, fast food, good price.

name: Danielle C
text: Very good options and they have vegan cheese!

name: bryan jones
text: Great food and staff

name: Joshua Sanders
text: Many different pizza options for less than your average small pizza at pizzahut.

name: Erica Schwarz
text: Great pizza and fun concept!

name: Nick Iskersky
text: 2:15am ... I just witnessed the employees laughing at is as we tried to enter the establishment then turn off the (we are open) sign and ignore us .... why be open till 2;30 am and turn paying customers away durring open business hours...

name: Ashley Collins
text: Speedy and awesome!

text: This place is the bomb! Where else can you get your pizza with a pesto base, brussel sprouts, artichoke hearts and fig drizzle. No where else! Try it!
